snippet.title: "I don't think I can ever go back" - The Edge of Allegoria Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
This ain't no f@#%ing kid's game! The Edge of Allegoria combines a nostalgic world full of monsters, magic and weird adventure with a pinch of dark humor, moderate pixel violence and lots and lots of self-irony. The turn-based 2D RPG is out now on Steam.

BUY NOW ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870700/The_Edge_of_Allegoria/

Follow CobraTekku Games on social media:
